#!/bin/sh
apt-get update &&
  apt-get -y install apt-transport-https ca-certificates &&
  echo "deb [trusted=yes] https://apt.fury.io/cirruslabs/ /" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/cirruslabs.list &&
  apt-get update &&
  apt-get -y install cirrus-cli &&
  echo "[Unit]
Description="Run a persistent Cirrus CLI worker configured by /etc/cirrus.yml"

[Service]
ExecStart=/usr/bin/cirrus cli worker run --config /etc/cirrus.yml

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target" > /etc/systemd/system/cirrus-worker.service &&
  systemctl daemon-reload &&
  systemctl enable cirrus-worker
